code: import React,{useCallback}from'react';import{Redirect}from'react-router-dom';import{connect}from"react-redux";import{login}from"../../redux/reducers/authReducer";import Login from"./Login";var LoginContainer=function LoginContainer(props){var sendUserData=useCallback(function(data){props.login(data);},[]);if(props.isAuth)return React.createElement(Redirect,{to:"/profile/".concat(props.userId)});return React.createElement(Login,{sendUserData:sendUserData,captchaUrl:props.captchaUrl});};var mapSTP=function mapSTP(state){return{isAuth:state.auth.isAuth,captchaUrl:state.auth.captchaUrl,userId:state.auth.id};};export default connect(mapSTP,{login:login})(LoginContainer);
